content: Is there an easy way (perhaps a JSON file or table online) to check what commit each nightly was built from? I'm mainly curious to use it as an easy to way to check whether a nightly contains changes from a merged PR or not.
There's the table of Rust components, but that doesn't seem to display a commit hash...
I think there might be a file in the plain src tarballs too
but the nightly will also report version in rustc -vV
Thanks, that works pretty well. :smile:
